FuncDef: This command configures the server address to use in application definition. The server IP address may be the source or destination, network or subscriber IP address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a comparison operator that the value configured and the value in the flow are equal.
Specifies a comparison operator that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.
Specifies a DNS IP cache name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the name of an IP prefix list, up to 32 characters.
